title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.43 - Book of original entry
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.43 - Book of original entry

State Regulations
A record book, recognized by law or custom, in which
transactions are successively recorded, and which is the source of posting to
ledgers; a journal. Books of original entry include general and special
journals, such as cashbooks and registers of sales and
purchases. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
451.43

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
